function EP01_07() ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_07_0_0") end

function EP01_07_0_0()

    -- .承-4「入学式」
    SaveData.Title = "入学式"


    -- //BG：百合愛学園_正門
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG005aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav",0)

    MSG([[ Several tens of minutes after transferring buses. Because the transfer went smoothly, the clock had not yet passed eight o'clock, and there were no students to be seen at all. ]])

    MSG([[ I hadn’t properly checked the enrollment guide, so I didn’t know the time of the entrance ceremony, but it was probably still early. ]])

    MSG([[ The Yuriai Private Academy I visited for the first time in about a month felt quite different from before. ]])

    -- //BG：メインストリート（春）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Beautiful rows of trees with cherry blossoms fluttering down like snow. Normally I would walk this path with my heart swelling with excitement and anxiety about the new life ahead, but now I could only see a dark shadow cast. ]])

    MSG([[ Of course, since my sister Marika must have been caught up in some kind of incident within this school. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0094.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Serious
 (If there were other students here, I’d want to ask them about Marika, but there’s no sign of any. Is there anything I can do before the entrance ceremony...?) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ As I looked around the surroundings while moving forward, the rooftop of the school building suddenly came into view. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0095.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Serious
 (The cause of my sister being taken to the hospital was... a strong impact to the head) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0096.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Serious
 (Could it be that she fell from the rooftop...? No way...) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Such a simplistic idea. But under the rooftop is a deep thicket that could act as a cushion, so even if she did fall, it’s unlikely she would have died. ]])

    MSG([[ It might be possible for someone like her to suffer only a head injury from an impact. ]])

    MSG([[ Unable to sit still with such terrible thoughts growing, I decided to go inside the school to check the rooftop. ]])

    -- //SE：歩く音
    PLAY_SE("SEa030.wav")
--    WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002",1000,false)

    -- //BG：1F廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BG：2F廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ab")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BG：3F廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ac")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BG：4F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000)

    MSG([[ When I reached the fourth floor of the school building, I realized there was no way the door to the rooftop would be open at this hour. ]])

    MSG([[ In fact, at the schools I’ve attended before, it was usually only opened during events or lunch breaks. It’s hard to believe that a prestigious all-girls school would keep the rooftop door unlocked. ]])

    MSG([[ Just to be sure, I inspected the door’s structure and decided to look around elsewhere. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Sad
 “It feels like I’m about to break in, but maybe I should learn lockpicking from my mentor just in case…” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Once again feeling guilty about contemplating such an act, I climbed the stairs and grabbed the doorknob to the rooftop. ]])

STOP_BGM()

    -- //SE： 扉を開く音
    PLAY_SE("SEb008.wav")
    --WAIT(100)

    MSG([[ Then— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Surprised
 “Eh...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",250,false)

    -- //BG：屋上（光加工）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000)

    MSG([[ To my surprise, the door opened without problem. The morning sunlight pouring in blinded me momentarily. ]])

    MSG([[ As my eyes adjusted, I noticed a girl standing right ahead. ]])

    MSG([[ The instant her appearance became clear, I involuntarily caught my breath. ]])

    -- //CG：謎の少女との邂逅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV002ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-150,300)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-150,-400,20000,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav",0)

    MSG([[ —Beautiful girl. The first thought that came to mind. ]])

    MSG([[ Her vivid long hair shining in the morning sun was styled into twin tails secured with crown-shaped hair clips, evoking the image of an angel with wings spread wide. ]])

    MSG([[ Her large, round eyes gave her a youthful impression, but her bearing was mature. ]])

    MSG([[ Her limbs, visible from the sleeves and hem, were thinner than any girl I had ever seen, her skin as white and smooth as a fresh ski slope untouched by footsteps. ]])

    MSG([[ The fancy decorations like ribbons and lace on her uniform added to her cuteness, making her look like the heroine of a magical girl anime had jumped right out of the screen. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV002aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    MSG([[ The rooftop, surrounded by a green fence, stretched out in my view. The beautiful girl stood before the fence, turned back to look at me, and her movement froze. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (No way... that such a beautiful person exists here.) ]])
    　
    MSG([[ I couldn’t take my eyes off her and continued staring intently. ]])

    MSG([[ It was my first time ever being captivated by a woman other than my sister. The more I looked, the cuter she seemed, and my heartbeat was hammering rapidly, almost bursting. ]])

    MSG([[ “Sorry for startling you!” “What’s your name?” “Are you someone from this school?” “What are you doing on the rooftop?” “Do you know Marika Ikusa?” ]])

    MSG([[ All these questions flew into my overheated mind, only to vanish before I could speak them. ]])

    MSG([[ Finally, the words that came out of my mouth were ones I myself barely understood. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0100.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “We... have met somewhere before, haven’t we...?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Girl】
 “...Huh?” ]])

    MSG([[ The girl opened her eyes wide. Then, her face flushed like a ripening apple, and tears welled up in her eyes. ]])

    -- //CG：謎の少女との邂逅（涙）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV002ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (What the hell am I saying...!) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (If a girl I’m meeting for the first time hears this from a stranger, she’s bound to think I’m creepy!) ]])

    MSG([[ I was confused myself by the absurd question. I had no memory of meeting her, yet I couldn’t shake this sense of déjà vu. This was a new feeling for me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Girl】
 “Why…? Why… this way…” ]])

    MSG([[ The girl covered her face with both hands and let out a strained voice. My mind went blank, and I stammered out every explanation I could think of. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0103.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “S-sorry for suddenly saying something weird! I don’t really understand it myself, but I just have this feeling I’ve met you before… and that’s why…” ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //BG：屋上
    PLAY_SE("SEa017.wav")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017aa")
    -- //BU：アルメリア（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,1000,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //SE：足音
    --PLAY_SE("SEa017.wav")
    --WAIT(600)
    -- //BU：無し

    --STOP_SE("SEa017.wav")
    -- //SE：身体の接触音
    PLAY_SE("SEa013.wav")

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    STOP_SE("SEa017.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Flustered
 “Ouch!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The girl pushed me away and ran off the rooftop. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0105.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Flustered
 (I have to apologize!) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ I reflexively chased after her and dashed out onto the rooftop. ]])

    -- //SE：足音
    PLAY_SE("SEa017.wav")
    --WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",1000,false)

    -- //BG：4F廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BG：3F廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ac")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    -- 　
    -- //BG：2F廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ab")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BG：1F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 1000)

    MSG([[ I reached the first floor, but there was no sign of the girl anywhere. ]])

    MSG([[ Did she run down the stairs so fast even I, a guy, couldn’t keep up...? ]])

    MSG([[ Or did she secretly hide in a classroom on another floor...? ]])

    MSG([[ I had no clue where she went and completely lost sight of her. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

    -- //BG：2F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000)

    -- //BU：ヒユ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,255)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Feeling baffled, I headed upstairs to the second floor and saw a girl in uniform sweeping. ]])

    MSG([[ Perfect. Maybe she saw the girl running away just now, and I could get some information about my sister. ]])

    MSG([[ With no other leads, I decided to ask. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal
 “Excuse me. I’m a new student, but could I talk with you for a moment?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,50,100,Ease.InCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",100,true)

    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,300,Ease.OutCubic)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Surprised
 “Hyaa!?” ]])

    MSG([[ The girl jumped back in surprise. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Flustered
 “S-sorry. I didn’t mean to startle you!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --吉　キャラクターをここでシェイクさせてもいいかも

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】Sad
 “Hyaaaa... hyyaaaahhh...” ]])

    MSG([[ The girl broke into a cold sweat and looked extremely shocked. I think I wasn’t saying anything too strange this time, but what’s her problem? ]])

    MSG([[ Worried, I watched her closely, when suddenly— ]])

--吉　背景拡大と大キャラを使って顔のアップ
--吉　集中線をここに入れたい

PLAY_BGM("BGM04.wav",0)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG013af")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",300,false)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0003.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0108.wav")

    【Minato】Flustered
 “Wah!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0004.wav")

 “Hyaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!” ]])

    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    -- //SE：ポカポカ

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI007a")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0110.wav")

    【Minato】Sad
 “O-ouch! That hurts! Stop it!” ]])

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-400,500,Ease.OutCubic)

WAIT(500)

function EP01_07_1_0()
    -- //選択肢
    SELECT({
        "階段を駆け下りる。",
        "階段を駆け上がる。"
    })
    while IsSelect() == true do Wait(0) end

    local result = SelectResult()
    -- 選択肢分岐
    if result == "階段を駆け下りる。" then
        ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_07_2_1")
    elseif result == "階段を駆け上がる。" then
        ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_07_2_2")
    end
end

function EP01_07_1_1()
    MSG([[ Either way, the choice depends on factors beyond myself. If a security guard even I couldn’t beat were there, it would be game over. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0129.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Serious
 “Calm down... There has to be a better escape route.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ I saw a window was open. If I used the technique my relative taught me, maybe I could jump out somehow. ]])

    MSG([[ But one mistake would mean a serious injury. Should I run down to the first floor, or risk jumping out the window? ]])

    MSG([[ Either way, it was a bad bet. I chose— ]])

    -- //選択肢
    SELECT({
        "階段を駆け下りる。",
        "階段を駆け上がる。",
        "窓から飛び降りる。"
    })
    while IsSelect() == true do Wait(0) end

    local result = SelectResult()
    -- 選択肢分岐
    if result == "階段を駆け下りる。" then
        ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_07_2_1")
    elseif result == "階段を駆け上がる。" then
        ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_07_2_2")
    elseif result == "窓から飛び降りる。" then
        ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_07_2_3")
    end
end

function EP01_07_2_1()
    MSG([[ —run down the stairs. ]])

    MSG([[ That was obviously the only option. Even if they were lying in wait, I’m skilled in arrest techniques. ]])

    MSG([[ I was confident I could break through some of their encirclement. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
